title: Gildan Adult Heavy Cotton Long Sleeve T-Shirt, Style G5400, 2-Pack
description: Versatile mid-weight fabric for year-round wear
Tear away label for customizable comfort
Screen printing, embroidery, DTG, iron-on transfers, bleaching and tie dye

Gildan’s G5400 Adult Heavy Cotton Long Sleeve T-Shirt gives you great your round coverage. Made of 100% U.S cotton, it features a classic fit and rib knit cuffs. It can be worn for any casual occasion or dress it up with a vest or blazer. This soft, comfortable fabric can be decorated with just about any ink or paint, embroidery, iron-on transfers, bleaching and tie dye.
